flawed_nl_solution:
He has 2 more belts than hats and he has 5 hats so he has 2+5 = <<2+5=7>>7 belts
He has twice as many shoes as belts and he has 7 belts so he has 2*7 = <<2*7=41>>41 shoes
#### 41

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 41. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
